TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit JsonReaderWriterFactory extends System.Object
public ref class JsonReaderWriterFactory abstract sealed

summary.span: 生成 实例和 实例，前者可以从流或缓冲区中读取 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON) 编码数据，并将其映射到 XML Infoset；后者可以将 XML Infoset 映射到 JSON，并将 JSON 编码数据写入流中。

span.span: Produces instances of that can read data encoded with JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) from a stream or buffer and map it to an XML Infoset and instances of that can map an XML Infoset to JSON and write JSON-encoded data to a stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Communication Foundation （WCF）使用 JSON 数据和 XML 信息集之间的映射处理 JSON 消息。Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) processes JSON messages using a mapping between JSON data and the XML Infoset. 通常，此映射是隐藏的。Normally, this mapping is hidden from view. 但是，在某些高级方案中，可能需要手动在 JSON 和 XML 之间进行转换。However, in some advanced scenarios it may be necessary to manually convert between JSON and XML. 在这种情况下，可以使用 类来创建所需的 XML 读取器和编写器。In this case, the class can be used to create the necessary XML readers and writers. 请注意，并非每个 XML Infoset 元素都可以映射到 JSON。Note that not every XML Infoset element can be mapped to JSON. 有关映射的详细信息，请参阅[如何：对 JSON 数据进行序列化和反序列](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-serialize-and-deserialize-json-data)化。For more information about mapping, see [How to: Serialize and Deserialize JSON Data](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-serialize-and-deserialize-json-data).

summary.span: 创建一个 ，它可以将 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON) 编码流或缓冲区映射到 XML Infoset。

span.span: Creates an that can map - streams or buffers encoded with JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) to an XML Infoset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个重载均使用 来防止在读取不受信任数据时受到拒绝服务 (DOS) 攻击。Each of the overloads uses a to prevent Denial of Service (DoS) attacks when reading untrusted data. 有关在读取不受信任的数据时使用 来防止拒绝服务攻击的详细信息，请参阅[数据的安全注意事项](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/security-considerations-for-data)。For more information about using to prevent Denial of Service attacks when reading untrusted data, see [Security Considerations for Data](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/security-considerations-for-data).

summary.span: 创建一个 ，它可以将 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON) 编码缓冲区映射到 XML Infoset。

span.span: Creates an that can map buffers encoded with JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) to an XML Infoset.

returns.span: 一个 ，它可以处理 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON) 数据。

span.span: An that can process JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载不接受 参数。This overload does not accept an parameter. 在读取数据时，将自动检测字符编码（UTF-8、Unicode 或 Big-Endian Unicode）。The character encoding (UTF-8, Unicode or Big-Endian Unicode) is auto-detected when the data is read. 有关在读取不受信任的数据时使用 来防止拒绝服务攻击的详细信息，请参阅[数据的安全注意事项](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/security-considerations-for-data)。For more information about using to prevent Denial of Service attacks when reading untrusted data, see [Security Considerations for Data](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/security-considerations-for-data).

summary.span: 创建一个 ，它将 JSON 编码数据写入流中。

span.span: Creates an that writes data encoded with JSON to a stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 静态方法返回 的实例，该实例可以将 XML Infoset 映射到 JSON 流。The static method returns an instance of an that can map an XML Infoset to a JSON stream. 无法保证 可生成有效的 JSON。The is not guaranteed to produce valid JSON. 如果以 JSON-XML 映射不支持的方式使用它，则可能会引发异常或写入无效 JSON 文档。If it is used in a way not supported by the JSON-XML mapping, it may either throw an exception or write an invalid JSON document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认字符编码为 UTF-8。The default character encoding is UTF-8. 在关闭编写器时，也会关闭流。When the writer is closed, the stream is closed as well.
